Game.Name: Pagemaster, The (Europe)
Game.plot: Overview:The Pagemaster is a 1994 action-platformer game based on the movie of the same name. It was released on the Sega Genesis, SNES and PC.The player assumes the role of Richard (played by Macaulay Culkin in the movie), who must make his way through three worlds each consisting several levels and each based on a different literary genre. (Horror, Adventure and Fantasy.) Along with several collectibles completionists can also find a library card in each level. The player will lose whatever magical item they are holding if they are hit; this acts as a bonus hit, similar to the rings in Sonic the Hedgehog.The PC version of the game is completely different: it is an point and click adventure game that has a plot unrelated to that of the movie.Cheat: Jump LevelsPress Left, Up, Left, Up, Start, B, Right, A at the start of any world to jump levels.
